data.message: Eminem when is your album coming? You need to release that shit now cause we've been waiting too long!!

replies.message: Not the time for it considering what this post is about.
Wah. 🙄
It's gonna released probably in November, but that's not a safe Call.
Christopher Koch I reckon next year
We haven't been waiting long enough my friend.

Mr.Marshall you 're gonna make me have a high.tension.arteriel or a high sugar in blood by a crazy waitin
Cause everytime i on your page and all you posted and i see here is these things
Please don't post nothing and when you wanna post the album
Then post it
I think it's better
Will this be his last album? Cuz if he waits another 10 years to drop another album he will be 50+ years old
I've seen of facebook that they working on it already

My six sens is telling the coming album is " redemption" cause on the last album the song bad guy is was so angry and pissed off to be in controversy and caged by the fame " i'm your lack of conscience" by O.C.D
"Wanna be left alone , public-shadys excuse me "
And redemption ideas is coming afther the ideas i said on up
And expecially with the beard then he is getting more clear
To the point he can forgive his father and maybe he did made a song for him
( redemption will make us understand the meaning of the eminem show2)
Of course eminem is doing this bc he loves his his fans! And loves to help people

Stop pressuring him. Do you have any idea what it's like to be a recording artist, balancing recording new songs and travelling for tours to perform in concerts? It can be hectic, tiresome, and overwhelming. Let's quit hounding him and let the man breathe...

Not to mention being involved in humanitarian relief for countries suffering from disasters. He'll be expected to make an appearance, practically followed everywhere by fans, asking for autographs, and if someone already has high anxiety, it can be damaging to someone's psyche. I think the guy needs space and the ability to relax while doing what he loves, rapping.....just be patient...
He said his droppin on his birthday
